main.name: Elmer McElmeel
main.description: I recently graduated from Iowa State in the spring of 2022 with a Bachelors in Management Information Systems.
main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.

resume.skillmessage: Here are a few of the skills I have picked up.

education.description: At Iowa State I recieved a broad base of knowledge of everything from Marketing, Finance, Management, to SQL, Python, and Javascript.
In highschool I demonstrated leadership in multiple activities such as; Wrestling Team Captain, Member of National Honors Society, and Mentors in Violence Prevention Peer Mentor.

work.title: Systems Engineer
work.description: Set up, configured, performed troubleshooting, and fixed networking equipment, windows servers and workstations, Active Directoy, and O365.
work.desc2: Worked with virtualization technologies such as VMWare and Hyper-V.
work.desc3: Set up and configured firewalls such as Sonicwall, Watchguard, and Fortinet.
work.desc4: Backed up technologies including cloud-based backups with Synology and Datto.
work.desc5: Worked with cloud platforms such as AWS and Azure.
work.desc6: Utilized RMM (remote monitoring and management) such as Kaseya and Screenconnect.
work.desc7: Provided exceptional customer service and technical expertise on inbound calls and tickets generated by customers.
work.desc8: Performed onsite systems, network and security assessments using standard best practices and industry standard tools such as RapidFire.

work.title: Tech Sales Associate
work.description: Answered customers' questions and addressing problems and complaints in person and via phone.
work.desc2: Provided training sessions to customers, including Windows 10, Microsoft Office, and various office machines.
work.desc3: Sold and performed in-store computer diagnostics, troubleshooting, repairs, and setups.
work.desc4: Maintained small business networks and computers for several regular clients.
